BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_EXTERNAL_COMPLAINT_DTL (NUM_HOSPITAL_ID, NUM_EXT_COMP_ID, STR_COMPLAINT_BY, STR_COMP_NAME, STR_COMP_ADD, STR_COMP_CONT_NUM,STR_EMP_NO, STR_DEPARTMENT, STR_DESIGNATION, STR_COMPLAINT_REF_NO, STR_COMP_DTL, DT_COMP_RECEIVE_DATE, STR_COMP_RECEIVE_TIME, DT_ACTUAL_INCIDENT_DATE, STR_ACTUAL_INCIDENT_TIME, STR_ACTUAL_INCIDENT_PLACE, STR_MS_REMARKS, STR_MS_COMP_STATUS, STR_POLICE_DAIRY_NO, STR_FIR_NO, DT_FIR_DATE, STR_FIR_REGISTERED_BY, STR_POLICE_REMARKS, STR_POLICE_COMP_STATUS, STR_COURT_ORDER_NO, STR_COURT_CONCLUSION, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

DELETE FROM EST_EXT_COMP_COURT_DTL A WHERE NUM_EXT_COMP_ID=?
DELETE FROM EST_EXT_COURT_PROCEEDING_DTL A WHERE NUM_EXT_COMP_ID=?

UPDATE EST_EXTERNAL_COMPLAINT_DTL SET STR_COMPLAINT_BY=?, STR_COMP_NAME=?, STR_COMP_ADD=?, STR_COMP_CONT_NUM=?, STR_DEPARTMENT=?, STR_DESIGNATION=?, STR_COMPLAINT_REF_NO=?, STR_COMP_DTL=?, DT_COMP_RECEIVE_DATE=?, STR_COMP_RECEIVE_TIME=?, DT_ACTUAL_INCIDENT_DATE=?, STR_ACTUAL_INCIDENT_TIME=?, STR_ACTUAL_INCIDENT_PLACE=?, STR_MS_REMARKS=?, STR_MS_COMP_STATUS=?, STR_POLICE_DAIRY_NO=?, STR_FIR_NO=?, DT_FIR_DATE=?, STR_FIR_REGISTERED_BY=?, STR_POLICE_REMARKS=?, STR_POLICE_COMP_STATUS=?, STR_COURT_ORDER_NO=?, STR_COURT_CONCLUSION=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_EXT_COMP_ID=?
